alert.note: Alert for Gogebic (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:16AM EST until February 15 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Rain changes to snow this morning with snow accumulations of up to four inches expected by late afternoon. Falling temperatures as rain changes to snow may result in a flash freeze and icy travel conditions. * WHERE...Gogebic County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures fall below freezing around 9AM behind a cold front. The greatest snow amounts of two to four inches are expected along and west of US-2 between Ironwood and Wakefield.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
